price: Tengan cuidado de que no los desvíe el demonio, porque él es su enemigo declarado".
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walā yaṣuddannakumu al-shayṭānu innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
